name: Utility Coin
description: The string "FwrcPjGNdTbBXWBKktRvnNTnAfRNtv9nPDGV3gjgpump" is the Solana contract address (CA) for $UTILITY, a meme coin launched on the Solana blockchain. It's positioned as "The Useless Coin Killer," satirizing hype-driven memecoins by emphasizing "real utility" in a humorous wayâ€”think viral memes, community-driven narratives, and a mock "contract scanner" tool on its website. Inspired by quotes from crypto figures like CZ (Binance) and Anatoly (Solana), it taps into frustration with low-value tokens while embracing degen culture.
